title: Reply to a mention in comments

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Accounts. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. You can get the ID through the open_id field returned by /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the video on which you want to create a reply. You can get the video_id from the item_id field returned by /business/mention/comment/list/ .

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the comment to which you want to create a reply. You can get the comment_id from the comment_id field returned by /business/mention/comment/list/ .

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text content of the reply you want to create. Length limit: 150 characters (UTF-8 encoding). Example: This is a comment #comment ðŸ™‚ .
